column2: "Afei woyinom nye ɔmansin no mu mba a wofi ndɔmmumkɔ a Babilɔnhen Nebukadenezar sosoo hɔn koguu Babilɔn no sanee bae
column3: na wɔsanee baa Jerusalɛm na Juda
column4: na obiara kɔr no kurow mu."

column12: na Baana bae. Israel man mu nyimpa dodow nye yi:"

column8: hɔn nyinara wɔyɛ ɔha eduasa akron."

column2: "Na woyinom nye hɔn a wofi Tel-mela
column6: nye Immer sanee bae no: na woenntum annkyerɛ hɔn egyanom efiefi

column4: Barzillai a ɔwaar Gileadnyi Barzillai ne mbabaa no mu bi
column5: na wɔdze hɔn dzin too no no

column2: "Woyinom wɔhwehwɛɛ hɔn ebusua nwoma wɔ hɔn a wɔnam do buu hɔn ano no mu
column3: naaso woennhu: dɛm ntsi wobuu hɔn ahoɔfifo na woyii hɔn fii asɔfodzi no mu."
mma wonndzi krɔnkrɔndze mu adzekrɔnkrɔn no bi
column4: ma onkodu dɛ ɔsɔfo bi dze Urim na Tummim begyina hɔ."

column2: "Mboanofo no nyinara yɛ mpemeduanan ebien ahaasa eduosia
column4: "ɔsor hɔn nkowaa na hɔn mfonabaa a hɔn so wɔyɛ mpemesuon ahaasa eduasa esuon: na wɔwɔ mbarimba adwontofo na mbaa adwontofo ahaenu."

column2: "Hɔn mpɔnkɔ yɛ ahaesuon eduasa esia; hɔn asoasompɔnkɔ
"hɔn efumpɔnkɔ ahaanan eduasa enum; hɔn nsoasopɔnkɔ
"Na wɔbaa EWURADZE fie a ɔwɔ Jerusalɛm no ara pɛr
column3: nna egyanom efiefi etsitsir no mu binom fi hɔn pɛ mu kyekyɛɛ Nyankopɔn fie no ho ndzɛmba dɛ wɔmfa mma do nsi ne sibew:"

column2: "wɔmaa dɛ mbrɛ hɔn tum tse na wɔdze guu edwuma no ho adzekoradze no mu

column9: na Israel nyinara so tsenatsenaa hɔn nkurow mu."
